entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 12:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to flurries this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
